title: Aventon Abound Cargo eBike First Look: Grocery-Getter Could Replace Your Car
content:
The Aventon Abound hauls the kids, grabs the groceries, and can carry other supplies for urban living. It might be a viable car replacement.

The post Aventon Abound Cargo eBike First Look: Grocery-Getter Could Replace Your Car appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
